translations.chinese: 羽下梁地十餘城，聞海春侯破，乃引兵還。
translations.english: Xiang Yu took over 10 cities in Liang territory. He heard that Hai Chun Marquis was defeated, so he led troops back.

translations.chinese: 漢軍方圍鍾離辚於滎陽東，聞羽至，盡走險阻。
translations.english: The Han army was surrounding Zhongli Mo east of Xingyang. When they heard Xiang Yu had arrived, they all fled to difficult terrain.

translations.chinese: 羽亦軍廣武， 與漢相守。
translations.english: Xiang Yu also encamped at Guangwu and confronted Han.

translations.chinese: 丁壯苦軍旅，老弱罷轉餉。
translations.english: The able-bodied suffered from military campaigns, the old and weak were exhausted from transporting provisions.

translations.chinese: 漢王、羽相與臨廣武之間而語。
translations.english: King Han and Xiang Yu faced each other across Guangwu and spoke.
